name: Chicken Citrus Crabstick Pear Salad
description: Dive into a high-protein, high-fiber delicacy with our Chicken Citrus Crabstick Pear Salad. Perfect for those looking to maintain a healthy lifestyle without sacrificing flavor. Each bite is a fusion of tender boiled chicken, crisp Iceberg lettuce, succulent seafood crabstick, and crunchy baby corn, all complemented by the freshness of orange and pear. Topped off with a boiled egg for an extra protein punch, this salad is not just a meal; it's a healthy, flavorful journey!
recipeIngredient: 1 large egg (50 g), Egg, Large, Boiled

recipeInstructions.text: Shred the Iceberg lettuce, slice the seafood crabstick, dice the young baby corn, and cut the boiled chicken breast into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and segment the small orange, and chop the pear into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the boiled large egg into thin slices or wedges.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, combine the lettuce, crabstick, baby corn, chicken, orange segments, and pear. Gently toss to mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Top the salad with egg slices and serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
